name: LitMan Item Stack
description:
[quote]Latest Update. Dev Kit Version 265775.27373.[/quote]

[b]Item stack increased 10 times.[/b]

Does not Stacks Armor, Weapons and Pet Items.

Best used with "LitMan Increased Weight".

Does not work with "LitMan Container Size" and "LitMan Item Stack & Container Size". 

If you want bigger stacks and containers at the same time use "LitMan Item Stack & Container Size".

Support Channel on Discord: https://discord.gg/DutEMJr

I released all my Source files on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods if anyone wants to keep updated those Mods or release own ones.

If you need a previous version it also could be found on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods/tree/master/Compiled

Mod ID: 884162441
changeNote:
Dev Kit Version 265775.27373

Updated to match the live game version.
